title: Inland Craft WizlingCG Glass Grinder | Glass Art Grinding Shaping Machine | Includes Diamond Grinding Bit
features: Inland Craft's WizlingCG glass grinder is a top choice for the budget-conscious or new glass art hobbyists. Use this American-made machine for grinding and shaping glass edges, stained glass work or lapidary projects.
Includes one 3/4" diameter, 100# diamond grinding bit. This grinder accepts many different grinding bits to accommodate your edge grinding needs.
Its 16 oz-in torque, 115V motor provides plenty of power to get the job done.
Made of lightweight, rustproof, impact-resistant material with small footprint. Easy to travel with and portable.
Manufactured in the U.S.A. Comes backed with a five-year warranty.
description: The Inland Craft WizlingCG glass grinder is a top choice for the budget-conscious or new glass art hobbyists. Use this American-made machine for grinding and shaping glass edges, stained glass work or lapidary projects. The WizlingCG accepts many different grinding bits to accommodate your edge grinding needs. Its 16 oz-in torque, 115V motor provides plenty of power for your glass grinding projects. The grinder housing is lightweight, rustproof and impact resistant, making it easy to travel with and very portable. Large 10-1/2" x 8-1/2" work surface is reversible and provides enough room for larger projects. The lift-off reservoir is removable for fast cleaning. Grinder setup is easy; simply install the included diamond grinding bit, wet the coolant sponge with clean water, and fire it up by flipping the two-way power switch. The WizlingCG includes the following: one 3/4" diameter 100# diamond grinding bit, Allen wrench for diamond grinding bit, coolant sponge and grinder bit splash guard. This grinder also includes complete instructions and a five-year manufacturer warranty. All Inland Craft machines are brand new and manufactured in the U.S.A. We ensure the authenticity of your Inland Craft machine by us, the manufacturer.
